title: Chaos
body:
So i have 270 chaos things and needed 10 more, the event ended less than a hour ago. 
Cant even get my border now!!   

#FEELSBADMAN

replies.body: draw a picture for riot and send it to support asking for 10 chaos tokens instead of RP
nah they took that off too so shiit it says 27th of the 7th but they took it down on the first of the month??
Can't you buy them in the store? It says they'll vanish on the 27th of the 7.
